page.title: 11BRIGG DUSTBIN MAN'S DAY
page.content: At 7.l5 am he arrives at work. He checks his lorry, fills the tank with diesel and then he loads black plastic bags on to his wagon. When he has finished checking everything he is ready to go out on his rounds. He has three other men helping on his round. They all climb into the wagon to set off to where the round begins. Two men are bringing bags out of the houses, and leaving them on the path way. Then the lorry driver comes round to each pile of rubbish and another man throws the piles of rubbish in the back. When the lorry is full the driver takes the rubbish to the tip.
